text: Kuma annabinsu ya ce musu: "Lalle ne, Allah ya naɗa muku ¦ãlũta ya zama sarki." Suka ce: "Yãya ne sarauta zã ta kasance a gare shi, a kanmu, alhãli kuwa mũ ne mafi cancanta da sarauta daga gare shi, kuma ba a bã shi wata wadata ba daga dũkiya?" Ya ce: "Lalle ne, Allah Yã zãɓe shi a kanku, kuma Ya ƙãra masa yalwa a cikin ilmi da jiki. Kuma Allah Yana bãyar da mulkinSa ga wanda Yake so, kuma Allah Mawadaci ne, Masani
